page.title: 15A POLICEMAN'S DAY,FENSTANTON
page.content: {*PC BUCKINGHAM-Fenstanton Policeman* { 18:00 }On duty Hilton,man about{gun {licence 18:30}Hemingford Grey parish council meeting about{abandoned car. { 19:00}Check car,owner via HQ{ { 20:00 }See owner at Fenstanton about moving car.{20:20}Report{alarm at {Lloyds Bank. 20:25}Lloyds Bank check building with another P.C.{ { 21:00 }A604 Hemingford,{accident,}car and lorry.Car driver injured ambulance called.Breakdown truck car removed { 22:00}Supper{22:10}Check village { 23:20}St.Ives,a{noisy group of lads { 23:45}Check Hemingfords.{24:00 Horse {loose}at Hilton 00:05 Horse put in field,farmer called.{00:45 }Fenstanton { 01:00}Report of{supicious man}St.Ives { 01:05}London Rd, man looking for his dog{01:15}Hemingford Abbotts 2{men {arrested}for poaching,taken to ST.Ives { 01:50}Men{released 02:00}Finish.
